00023 MathMLEdit::MathMLEdit(QWidget *parent, Qt::WFlags f)
00024         : QWidget(parent, f) {
00025     // set layout
00026         QVBoxLayout *layout = new QVBoxLayout();
00027         setLayout(layout);
00028     donotupdate = false;
00029 
00030     /* add a text field for writing the mathml
00031        every time the text changes, a signal is sent to various other parts
00032        of the program */
00033         QHBoxLayout *hl = new QHBoxLayout();
00034         layout->addLayout(hl);
00035         qte = new QTextEdit();
00036         hl->addWidget(qte);
00037         connect(qte, SIGNAL(textChanged()), this, SLOT(setMML()));
00038     // on the same line, add a cursorinfo widget
00039         cursorinfo = new CursorInfo();
00040         hl->addWidget(cursorinfo);
00041 
00042     /* start a new row */
00043         hl = new QHBoxLayout();
00044         layout->addLayout(hl);
00045 //  hl->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Minimum, QSizePolicy::Fixed);
00046     /* add the most important widget: the one for viewing the mathml */

00149 MathMLEdit::~MathMLEdit() {
00150 }
00151 void
00152 MathMLEdit::setMML() {
00153     if (donotupdate) return;
00154         MMLReader mr;
00155 
00156         mr.parse(qte->toPlainText());
00157         MMLDocument *doc = mr.document();
00158         if (doc && doc->validate()) {
00159                 ql->setText("No errors");
00160                 cursorinfo->setDocument(doc);
00161                 mv->setDocument(doc);
00162         } else {
00163                 ql->setText(mr.error());
00164                 cursorinfo->setDocument(0);
00165                 mv->setDocument(0);
00166         }
00167         //latex->parseData(qte->toPlainText());
00168 }
00169 void
00170 MathMLEdit::setExamplesDir(const QString &dir) {
00171         examplesdir = dir;
00172         QDir d(dir);
00173         // find all subdirectories
00174         QStringList list;
00175         list.push_back("[^.]*");
00176         d.setNameFilters(list);
00177         QStringList entries = d.entryList(QDir::Dirs);
00178         dirlist->clear();
00179         // if there are examples in the current dir, add it
00180         list.clear();
00181         list.push_back("*.mml");
00182         d.setNameFilters(list);
00183         if (d.entryList(QDir::Files).size() > 0) {
00184                 entries += ".";
00185         }
00186         dirlist->addItems(entries);
00187         if (entries.size() < 2) {
00188                 dirlist->hide();
00189         } else {
00190                 dirlist->show();
00191         }
00192         setExamplesSubDir(dirlist->currentText());
00193 }
00194 void
00195 MathMLEdit::setExamplesSubDir(const QString &dir) {
00196         subdir = examplesdir;
00197         subdir += "/" + dir;
00198         QDir d(subdir);
00199         // find all subdirectories
00200         QStringList list;
00201         list.push_back("[^.]*");
00202         d.setNameFilters(list);
00203         QStringList entries = d.entryList(QDir::Dirs);
00204         subdirlist->clear();
00205         // if there are examples in the current dir, add it
00206         list.clear();
00207         list.push_back("*.mml");
00208         d.setNameFilters(list);
00209         if (d.entryList(QDir::Files).size() > 0) {
00210                 entries += ".";
00211         }
00212         subdirlist->addItems(entries);
00213         if (entries.size() < 2) {
00214                 subdirlist->hide();
00215         } else {
00216                 subdirlist->show();
00217         }
00218         setExamplesSubSubDir(subdirlist->currentText());
00219 }

00244 void
00245 MathMLEdit::loadExampleDir(const QString &sssdir) {
00246         dir = subsubdir + "/" + sssdir;
00247         QDir d(dir);
00248         QStringList list;
00249         list.push_back("*.mml");
00250         d.setNameFilters(list);
00251         QStringList files = d.entryList(QDir::Files);
00252         testicons->clear();
00253         if (files.size()) {
00254                 for (int i=0; i<files.size(); ++i) {
00255                         QString f = files[i];
00256                         QString imgf = f.left(f.length()-3) + "png";
00257                         QImage qi(dir+"/"+imgf);
00258                         int height = 64;
00259                         if (!qi.isNull()) {
00260                                 qi = qi.scaled(height, height,
00261                                         Qt::KeepAspectRatio,
00262                                         Qt::SmoothTransformation);
00263                         }
00264                         QListWidgetItem *ivi;
00265                         ivi = new QListWidgetItem(f, testicons);
00266                         ivi->setIcon(QPixmap::fromImage(qi));
00267                 }
00268                 testicons->show();
00269                 testimage->show();
00270         } else {
00271                 testicons->hide();
00272                 testimage->hide();
00273         }
00274 }
00275 void
00276 MathMLEdit::showFile() {
00277     donotupdate = true;
00278     QListWidgetItem *ivi = testicons->currentItem();
00279         QString f = ivi->text();
00280         QString i = f.left(f.length()-3) + "png";
00281         QImage img(dir+"/"+i);
00282         img = latex->cleanse(img);
00283         testimage->setPixmap(QPixmap::fromImage(img));
00284         QFile file(dir+"/"+f);
00285         file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly);
00286         qte->setPlainText(file.readAll());
00287     donotupdate = false;
00288     setMML();
00289 }
00290 void
00291 MathMLEdit::changeFont(const QString &family) {
00292         QFontDatabase qfd;
00293 
00294         QString style = stylelist->currentText();
00295         stylelist->clear();
00296         stylelist->addItems(qfd.styles(family));
00297         for (int i=0; i< stylelist->count(); ++i) {
00298                 if (style == stylelist->itemText(i)) {
00299                         stylelist->setCurrentIndex(i);
00300                 }
00301         }
00302 
00303         int size = updateSizeList(family, style);
00304         mv->changeFont(qfd.font(family, style, size));
00305 }
00306 int
00307 MathMLEdit::updateSizeList(const QString family, const QString &style) {
00308         QFontDatabase qfd;
00309         QList<int> sizes = qfd.smoothSizes(family, style);
00310         pointsize = true;
00311         if (sizes.isEmpty()) {
00312                 sizes = qfd.pointSizes(family);
00313                 pointsize = false;
00314         }
00315         if (sizes.isEmpty()) {
00316                 sizes = qfd.standardSizes();
00317                 pointsize = true;
00318         }
00319         if (pointsize) {
00320                 sizelabel->setText("pointsize:");
00321         } else {
00322                 sizelabel->setText("pixelsize:");
00323         }
00324         int size = lastSelectedSize;
00325         sizelist->clear();
00326         int ds=1000;
00327         int pos = 0;
00328         for (int i=0; i < sizes.size(); ++i) {
00329                 sizelist->addItem(QString::number(sizes[i]));
00330                 int x = 0;
00331                 if (sizes[i] == 0) x = 1;
00332                 if (abs(sizes[i]-size) <= ds) {
00333                         ds = abs(sizes[i]-size);
00334                         pos = i;
00335                 }
00336         }
00337         sizelist->setCurrentIndex(pos);
00338         sizelist->setEnabled(sizelist->count()>1);
00339         return size;
00340 }
00341 void
00342 MathMLEdit::changeStyle(const QString &style) {
00343         QFontDatabase qfd;
00344         QString family = familylist->currentText();
00345         int size = updateSizeList(family, style);
00346         mv->changeFont(qfd.font(family, style, size));
00347 }
00348 void
00349 MathMLEdit::changeSize(const QString &s) {
00350         bool ok;
00351         int size = s.toInt(&ok);
00352         if (!ok) {
00353                 return;
00354         }
00355         QFontDatabase qfd;
00356         QFont f = qfd.font(familylist->currentText(),
00357                 stylelist->currentText(),
00358                 size);
00359         if (!pointsize) {
00360                 f.setPixelSize(size);
00361         }
00362         mv->changeFont(f);
00363         lastSelectedSize = size;
00364 }
00365 void
00366 MathMLEdit::changeZoom(const QString &s) {
00367         bool ok;
00368         int size = s.toInt(&ok);
00369         if (!ok) {
00370                 return;
00371         }
00372         mv->changeZoom(size/100.0);
00373 }
00374 void
00375 MathMLEdit::setOutline() {
00376         mv->setOutline(debug->isChecked());
00377 }
00378 void
00379 MathMLEdit::setActive(QComboBox *b, const QString &s) {
00380         int size = b->count();
00381         for (int i=0; i<size; ++i) {
00382                 if (b->itemText(i) == s) {
00383                         b->setCurrentIndex(i);
00384                 }
00385         }
00386 }
